description: In this course you will find the verb be (the present, past and past participle forms), the simple present tense, the present continuous tense, the simple past tense, the simple past continuous tense and the present continuous tense. The course is in Turkish and English. The tenses are explained with example sentences and tips. All the materials needed are provided in document forms apart from the videos. The course will take about 40 minutes to complete the video part. It'll also structured from hard to easy. Believe me you need this course if you have problems with understanding the tenses in English.
title: Learn tenses in English part 1 for YDS exam
